feed.title: Sarah Maddox Groves
feed.subtitle: Hi! I'm currently a Ph.D. Candidate at Vanderbilt University. I'm a cancer systems biologist studying phenotypic transitions in Small Cell Lung Cancer, but I'm also interested in single cell analysis, machine learning, and data analysis.

entry.title: Welcome!
entry.content:
Welcome to my site! I’ll be using this site as a medium for helpful coding walk-throughs, visual explanations of difficult math and science concepts, and as a way to keep up with the ever-changing field of cancer systems biology. Thanks for joining me!

Sarah Maddox Groves
